Chhattisgarh Government has issued new guidelines for testing travellers coming to the State as part of preventive measures to contain the spread of Covid-19.

description: Raipur (Chhattisgarh) [India], April 23 (ANI): Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel on Friday urged that the cost of COVID-19 vaccines should be uniform for the Centre as well as states.

title: As Covid cases and deaths rise in Chhattisgarh, BJP blames govt mismanagement

title: Kerala, MP, Assam, Chhattisgarh, UP say COVID-19 vaccine would be free from May 1
description: As the Union government is set to open the vaccination drive to all individuals above 18 years of age and announced that states can buy additional doses from vaccine manufacturers directly (apart from what the Centre allocates), many wondered if the COVID-19 vaccine would continue to remain free of cost. Amid such concerns, some states such as Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Assam and Chhattisgarh have announced that the vaccine would be free of cost for all eligible individuals. Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan also stressed that the vaccine would continue to remain free of cost.

title: Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh Announce Free Covid Vaccine For All Above 18
description: Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh will offer the COVID-19 vaccine free of cost from May 1, when India's vaccination drive will widen to include all people over the age of 18, becoming the latest states to do so.

title: Pregnant DSP managing traffic in Chhattisgarh urges people to follow Covid norms. Pic goes viral
description: Five month pregnant DSP, Shilpa Sahu is posted in Dantewada of Chhattisgarh's Bastar division.

title: Taken the Covid-19 vaccine in Chhattisgarh? You may get 2 kg tomatoes!
description: As countries around the world try to inoculate maximum citizens, Covid-19 vaccination campaigns across India have spared no effort to get people vaccinated and stay ahead of the pandemic.  However, in a strange-sounding proposition, Chattisgarh will give its residents a unique gift for getting the jab: juicy tomatoes! Those getting vaccinated will be provided two kilograms of in a bid to encourage more people to be vaccinated. this "offer" has been implemented in all of Bijapur's hospitals that prescribe the Covid-19 vaccine.

title: Covid-19: Pregnant DSP appeals people to follow lockdown in Dantewada, Chhattisgarh | News - Times of India Videos
description: DSP Shilpa Sahu, who is posted in Maoist affected Bastar's Dantewada, appeals people to follow Covid-19 lockdown. The police officer, who is pregnant, is busy on the streets under the scorching sun said, "If I am out, they should know they must stay at home".
